Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Deploy ECS services for AI agents and update documentation

- Added ECS task definitions and services for planner, codegen, and remediation agents
- Configured Fargate deployment with 512 CPU / 1024 MB memory per agent
- Added Secrets Manager IAM policy for API key access
- Fixed VPC link and S3 bucket conflicts in Terraform
- Updated deployment script for Podman compatibility
- All 3 agent services now running on ECS

Infrastructure deployed:
- 70+ AWS resources managed by Terraform
- VPC with public/private subnets across 2 AZs
- API Gateway HTTP API for agent orchestration
- EventBridge custom event bus
- DynamoDB tables for state management
- S3 buckets for artifacts and templates
- ECR repositories with agent container images

Documentation updates:
- Updated README.md with current deployment status
- Updated architecture.md with deployed components section
- Added deployment verification commands

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add API Gateway integration with Application Load Balancer

- Created internal ALB with target groups for each agent service
- Added VPC Link to connect API Gateway to private VPC
- Configured 7 API Gateway routes for agent endpoints
- Updated ECS services to register with ALB target groups
- Fixed duplicate outputs and missing configurations
- Updated documentation with deployment status and usage examples

Infrastructure now fully operational with 90+ AWS resources:
- API Gateway publicly accessible at https://d9bf4clz2f.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/dev
- 3 ECS Fargate services running (planner, codegen, remediation)
- Internal ALB routing traffic to agents via target groups
- VPC Link for secure connectivity between public API Gateway and private ECS services
- DynamoDB, S3, Secrets Manager, EventBridge fully integrated

New files:
- DEPLOYMENT_STATUS.md - Comprehensive deployment status and usage guide
- docs/USAGE_GUIDE.md - Complete usage documentation
- iac/terraform/modules/ecs/load_balancer.tf - ALB configuration

Modified files:
- README.md - Updated status and quick start examples
- iac/terraform/main.tf - Added ALB integration to API Gateway module
- iac/terraform/modules/api_gateway/main.tf - Added VPC Link and routes
- iac/terraform/modules/api_gateway/variables.tf - Added ALB variables
- iac/terraform/modules/api_gateway/outputs.tf - Added VPC Link output
